text: the world looked a lot different 15
years ago
cell phones weren't yet smart dvds came
in the mail and building a digital
business meant buying and maintaining
expensive physical servers
amazon looked a lot different too
we were an e-commerce company in need of
a new type of infrastructure to support
rapid growth
we set out to create a common set of
secure services apis and developer tools
that would go on to become aws the
world's most comprehensive and broadly
adopted cloud platform with amazon ec2
at its core it started in 2006 with a
single instance people could tap into
virtually unlimited computing potential
businesses of all sizes could move from
idea to market faster without needing to
build their own data center
flash forward to today
aws now offers over 400 instance types
tailored for virtually any workload to
get here we knew we had to radically
innovate to deliver significant
performance improvements and cost
savings to our customers we started by
reimagining virtualization with the
nitro system offloading capabilities to

price performance and enhanced security
today aws supports more security

than any other cloud provider
the nitro system accelerated our
partnerships to deliver custom chips and

options
we also introduced our own custom

optimizing cost and performance
as aws grew our scale allowed us to save

we were able to introduce our first
